title: [Large-Scale] Informal Science Education and Experiential Communication Design

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary science education knowledge and foundational instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing informal science education design capabilities for pre-service and in-service teachers through experiential exhibition-based learning. Analysis and design of real-life connected educational cases using agriculture/environment themes.

learning_goals: Learners can design educational plans by applying three science communication strategies in experiential exhibition spaces.
Learners can develop instructional materials that convert agricultural and environmental scientific information into experiential activities for non-majors.
Learners can build a feedback collection and evaluation system by utilizing digital survey tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
